summary: Make it so the sun is lower on the horizon and towards the south (instead of slightly north in vanilla Skyrim), like it would appear in northern regions.
descriptionHtml:
Just a really simple change to move the fSunYExtreme from 40 to -200 per request of someone on Reddit. This moves the sun from slightly north to south and lower to the horizon. Skyrim is a northern region, so the sun should be south at midday and lower in the sky. This mod just does that.

Note that this mod doesn't make Skyrim's outside shadows 100% realistic with respect to the sun's position, as the world map light source is hard coded to go linear from east to west during the day and west to east during the night.

For some reason, my ENB's sun rays do not work with mod, this may occur for you too.

You can install or uninstall this mod at any time. It only alters that one game setting.
author: WankingSkeever
